Name: ensure_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Sprints must achieve their defined goals

Name: require_unique_team_assignment
Description: Each Worker must belong to exactly one Team

Name: enforce_task_prioritization
Description: All Tasks must have a defined priority

Name: require_feature_documentation
Description: All Features must have associated documentation

Name: enforce_blocker_resolution(Blockers must be resolved within 2 days)
require_stakeholder_involvement
Description: Stakeholders must participate in Sprint Reviews
